item.title: Guide: Configuring r2dbc + Flyway in Spring Boot to Postgres with enforced TLS/SSL
item.description: A reference and a how-to guide on configuring r2dbc + Flyway to enforce TLS when talking to Postgres from a Spring Boot application.

item.title: 2021 Tech Stack Migration Guide (Domains)
item.description: The following is a more in-depth guide on why and how I swapped out the domain registrar portion of my site’s tech stack over time.

item.title: How I got customized personal emails, a domain, and a website for 11 dollars a year
item.description: The following post contains a bunch of specific details on how I managed to get free custom domain emails and a website on the internet with my only ongoing cost being the domain name.
